I'm looking for a way to automate OOTB UTF8 support for my local environments + at the same time understand a little bit more about how Lando works. My .lando.yml looks like this:

name: whatever
# Use existing Backdrop recipe, then customise below.
recipe: backdrop

config:
  # Where Backdrop resides, relative to this file.
  webroot: docroot
  # Prefer MariaDB over MySQL.
  database: mariadb
  php: '7.2'
  backdrush: '1.3.1'
...

...which gets me "MySQL, MariaDB, or equivalent version 5.5.5-10.3.22-MariaDB" in the site status report.

...when I do lando ssh and run mysql --version, I get:
mysql Ver 15.1 Distrib 10.1.44-MariaDB, for debian-linux-gnu (x86_64) using readline 5.2
OK so it is my understanding from all that that the db container is different from the appserver container, but why does the appserver container have mysql installed as well?
...and back to my original question: how do I get a version of mariadb + the right settings to have it support UTF8 OOTB?

...also, is there a way to always pull the latest drush from https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/backdrop-drush-extension/releases w/o having to hardcode the version?

backdrop-contrib/backdrop-drush-extension
A set of commands and boot class for Drush and Backdrop CMS. - backdrop-contrib/backdrop-drush-extension
@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) ...? :yum:

For the moment, I have a script with the following the does some magic form me, but I'd rather Lando did it for me instead:

BACKDRUSH="$(curl -sL https://api.github.com/repos/backdrop-contrib/drush/releases/latest | jq -r '.tag_name')"
sed -i '' -e "s/'?.?.?'/'${BACKDRUSH}'/g" .lando.yml

(my .lando.yml has ?.?.? as a placeholder for the backdrush version)

set backdrop to the HEAD

backdrush: 1.x-1.x
in your .lando.yml file
I'm also interested. Need to then run lando rebuild?
Yep, always rebuild after editing lando config file.

Here's my one-liner to spin up a D7 site + admin_menu on my local using lando (broken down to multi-line here, for readability):

lando init \
  --source remote \
  --remote-url https://github.com/drupal/drupal/archive/7.x.zip \
  --remote-options="--strip-components 1" \
  --recipe drupal7 \
  --webroot ./drupal-7.x \
  --name d7test \
  && lando start \
  && lando drush si standard \
  --db-url=mysql://drupal7:drupal7@database:3306/drupal7 -r /app/drupal-7.x -y \
  && drush --root=/app/drupal-7.x dl admin_menu -y \
  && drush --root=/app/drupal-7.x en admin_menu admin_menu_toolbar -y
